Articles.Content:
SPARVIERO

Hi all! This is probably my best craft so far, it's a tribute to the legendary sr71 blackbird, but it is not a replica!!

Took me hours to figure it out, particulary the ejection sistem, so i hope u will enjoy my hard work

some statistics:

-nice smooth design

-2 engines

-about 10 intakes but not spammed around the craft

-max speed over 2000 m/s

-max altitude over 30k meters

-max crew: 2

-max fuel:300 (i know it is low, but this is intended for better speed performance)

-manouverability: well... it can perform a Kulbit

-ejection sistem included

now photos:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

download link:

http://www./view/ahy7oryqdo1q45c/Sparviero.craft
Wow thats cool! It looks mean at night, espacially with the shock heating. TFS
Isn't the Sparviero an Italian bomber from the 1930's?

Isn't the Sparviero an Italian bomber from the 1930's?

Yes it was, well i'm italian and i like the sparviero very much, and i like the name too (it means sparrowhawk), so i've decided to call my plane like it =)
